description: From rubberneck (verb) +â€Ž -er (suffix indicating person or thing that does an action indicated by the root verb).

entries.meaning: (originally US) A person who rubbernecks; someone who cranes their neck as though it were made of rubber to see something (such as a tourist attraction) or to watch an event (such as an accident); a rubberneck.
examples: Synonyms: gaper, gawker, gawper, onlooker, spectator, starer
The minor accident caused a traffic jam as rubberneckers slowed down to get a good view of the battered cars.
